Introduction

Huang Minghao, also known as Justin Huang, is a Chinese solo singer and member of the boy group NEX7 under Yuehua Entertainment.

In 2017, Minghao, along with fellow trainee, now groupmate Zhengting participated on Mnet's Produce 101 Season 2, apart of the Yuehua Entertainment trainees. He was eliminated in episode 8 with a total of 458,650 votes.
In early 2018, he participated on iQiYi's Idol Producer, where he ranked fourth place, earning himself a place in the group Nine Percent.

On June 21, 2018, he debuted as a member of Yuehua Entertainment's new boy group NEX7.
On August 3, 2020, Minghao released his first solo album "18".
